actions.committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Fossil and Synthetic Fuels.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Fossil and Synthetic Fuels

official_title: A resolution expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that the President should take all possible actions to collect the amount of any overcharges resulting from Petroleum Allocation Act of 1973, and to enforce the orders, rules, and regulations relating thereto.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that the President should take all possible actions to: (1) collect any overcharge resulting from a pricing violation under the Emergency Petroleum Allocation Act of 1973; and (2) enforce orders under the Department of Energy Organization Act with respect to petroleum pricing violations under the Emergency Petroleum Allocation Act of 1973.

titles.title: A resolution expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that the President should take all possible actions to collect the amount of any overcharges resulting from Petroleum Allocation Act of 1973, and to enforce the orders, rules, and regulations relating thereto.
